articles.title: Pete Rose to appear on Philadelphia Phillies' field with 1980 World Series title team
articles.description: Pete Rose will be part of Phillies alumni weekend and will be introduced on the field alongside many former teammates from the 1980 World Series championship team on Aug. 7.
articles.content:
PHILADELPHIA -- Pete Rose will make an appearance on the field in Philadelphia next month for the first time since receiving a lifetime ban from Major League Baseball.
Rose agreed to the lifetime ba… [+813 chars]

articles.title: U.S. women shock Jamaica to win 4x100 relay; U.S. men flounder again at world championships
articles.description: The U.S. women pulled a shocking upset over Jamaica in the 4x100 relay at world championships Saturday, while the men finished second to Canada.
articles.content: EUGENE, Ore. -- The U.S. women pulled a shocking upset over Jamaica in the 4x100 relay at world championships Saturday, while the men finished second after a sloppy baton exchange that has become a r… [+3291 chars]

articles.title: Called out of retirement, Allyson Felix helps 4x400 women's relay into final at world championships
articles.description: After leading the 4x400 mixed relay to a bronze medal on Friday, American Allyson Felix was called out of retirement and helped guide the 4x400 women's relay team to the final at the world championships on Saturday.
articles.content:
EUGENE, Ore. -- Enjoying retired life, Allyson Felix was eating hot wings and sipping on a root beer float in Los Angeles when the phone rang.
She was needed back in Oregon for the prelims of the 4x… [+2759 chars]

articles.title: Houston Astros' Justin Verlander stays hot vs. Mariners, becomes MLB's first 13-game winner
articles.description: Houston Astros right-hander Justin Verlander had nine strikeouts in seven innings Saturday to win his fifth straight start and become the major league's first 13-game winner.
articles.content: SEATTLE -- Justin Verlander became the major league's first 13-game winner, striking out nine and topping 99 mph in his final inning to lead the Houston Astros over the Seattle Mariners 3-1 on Saturd… [+1586 chars]

articles.title: Los Angeles Angels' Mike Trout (rib) won't be back from IL when eligible
articles.description: Mike Trout will not be returning when he's eligible to come off the IL on Monday after he received a cortisone injection earlier this week.
articles.content:
Los Angeles Angels star Mike Trout will not be returning when he's eligible to come off the injured list on Monday.

articles.title: Curtis Blaydes gets TKO win as Tom Aspinall suffers freak injury early in UFC heavyweight bout
articles.description: Tom Aspinall suffered a freak knee injury 15 seconds into Saturday's UFC heavyweight bout vs. Curtis Blaydes, giving Blaydes the injury TKO win.
articles.content:
LONDON -- The UFC has hit a bad streak of luck as of late, with a second consecutive main event ruined on Saturday by freak injury.
A highly anticipated heavyweight matchup between Curtis Blaydes an… [+1670 chars]

articles.title: ESPN analyst Tim Kurkjian honored by Baseball Hall of Fame with Career Excellence Award
articles.description: ESPN analyst Tim Kurkjian was honored by the Baseball Hall of Fame on Saturday, earning the Baseball Writers' Association of America's Career Excellence Award.
articles.content: COOPERSTOWN, N.Y. -- The love affair that ESPN's Tim Kurkjian has enjoyed for decades with the sport of baseball -- and everyone associated with it -- reached its pinnacle on Saturday when he was hon… [+3946 chars]

articles.title: Former North Carolina Tar Heels commit G.G. Jackson reclassifies to 2022 class, commits to South Carolina Gamecocks
articles.description: Elite rising senior G.G. Jackson announced on Saturday he will reclassify to the 2022 class and play for South Carolina this upcoming season, less than two weeks after he decommitted from North Carolina.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jeremy Fowler, Louis Riddick, Seth Walder, Field Yates
articles.title: NFL Future Power Rankings 2022 - Projections for all 32 teams for the next three seasons
articles.description: Which NFL teams are set up for long-term success? We used a weighted set of rankings to project all 32 franchises from now through the 2024 season.
articles.content: Projecting ahead and building for future success -- beyond just the current season -- is crucial in the NFL. That's what the best teams all do to stay at the top of the standings. So which teams are … [+70913 chars]
